name: NewYear'sResolutionsTracker
0:
”Alexa open resolutions tracker”
”Alexa tell resolutions tracker to add play tennis”
”Alexa tell resolutions tracker to log play tennis”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: resolutions tracker
des:
"The chains of habit are too weak to be felt until they are too strong to be broken." Samuel Johnson

The new year is the perfect time to build good habits and get rid of bad ones.
Resolutions Tracker helps you keep track of your New Year's Resolutions and turn them into habits to achieve your goals. 

To open say "Alexa open resolutionS tracker". 
Please be aware this is resolutionS tracker (with an s)
To add a new resolution just say "Alexa add (play tennis)". 
Then tell "Alexa log (play tennis)" each day you do it and Alexa will keep track of your streak.
To find out your streak simply say "Alexa what is my (play tennis) streak?"
Ask: "Alexa what are my resolutions?" and she will list all your resolutions.
You can always delete all your data by saying "Alexa delete all my resolutions".

We would love to hear your feedback.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
